Author: Dmitrijs
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: As we said many times before, in our opinion ICO's, that are issuing tokens, when they are already running business, and ICO is made just to add capital, is really unfair for investors. In such cases, they can get a loan in a bank or issue bonds, so they are just interested in cheap, % free capital.  In our case, tokens performance is no way correlated to company performance.

Author: cryder.io_support
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: Hi! Thank you for your question! All other "similar" projects are not decentralized. As we researched, all of them just using standard ride-sharing application with standard payments methods, they accept fiat money only or also. From other side Cryder is fully decentralized application. We are using Ethereum platform new technologies such as - Ethereum light client and whisper protocol for communication. As a payment method we accept only Cryder tokens. Please, read our Whitepaper for more details.

Author: cryder.io_support
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: Hi! Thank you for your interest! You understood correctly, but not at all - everyone who will join Cryder community could be a driver or a rider(passenger) as well. Please visit our website - www.cryder.io

Author: cryder.io_support
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: Hi! Thanks for your comment! We are not the "similar" platform. We are using new Ethereum platform technologies to made Cryder DApp. We use node light client and Whisper protocol for communication. Our platform fully decentralized, our application have no central authority, we do not collect, keep and process users private data. All payments will be available only in CDT, we do not accept fiat currency or alternative standard payment systems, we'll not accept and process credit/debit card also at all. Therefore we do not collect any users private and financial information. About more details you could read in a Whitepaper.

Author: Bianxee
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: What is the advantage of this decentralised taxi platform in Car Taxi platform? Although your platforms project seems to be also a big ico . Goodluck and i will wait for the answer.

Author: cryder.io_support
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: Hi, we have a completely different platform, as we are focused mainly on moving people, not cars and to completely decentralize it. CarTaxi is more of a towing service, on the other hand Cryder is riding/ driving service. All the main features of Cryder and differences from other "similar" platforms you could find in Whitepaper. Thank you for your question.

Author: MoneyJ
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: A decentralized Uber is what this project going to become. Its about time and hopefully it has a cheaper and wider coverage without state intervention . But naturally we as passengers need insurance for our protection in case we figure in an accident.

Author: Dmitrijs
Title: [ANN][ICO] ✅ CRYDER ✅ ▞▞Decentralized taxi platform for freelance drivers▚▚
Body: You are almost right, except for the fact we do not charge any fees. Wider coverage? Yes, just download the app and purchase Cryder tokens. State intervention? Lets see how they gonna stop blockchain. Passenger protection as we many times said, illegal stuff is illegal and other accidents, can always happen, there is no protection from that.
